snippet: ROSEFSKY--Julie. In loving memory of Julie Fergang Rosefsky, an extraordinary friend who will be missed tremendously. Our hearts go out to Steven, Eli, Maya and the entire Fergang family. Much love, Wendy & Lee Chaikin, Ray & Ross Hammerman, Hilary & Gregg Smith 1/3
lead_paragraph: ROSEFSKY--Julie. In loving memory of Julie Fergang Rosefsky, an extraordinary friend who will be missed tremendously. Our hearts go out to Steven, Eli, Maya and the entire Fergang family. Much love, Wendy & Lee Chaikin, Ray & Ross Hammerman, Hilary & Gregg Smith 1/3
